sentences.en: " Black beans and rice, fried bananas, and some stew.
sentences.cn: “ 黑豆饭 、 油炸香蕉, 还有些莼菜.

sentences.en: Don't indulge in rich sauces, fried food and thick pastry as these are high in fat.
sentences.cn: 不要吃太多浓酱汁、油炸食品和甜腻的油酥点心，因为这些食品的脂肪含量很高。

sentences.en: He got really fried at the party last night.
sentences.cn: 他在昨晚的晚会上真的喝醉了.

sentences.en: She ordered a portion of fried eggs.
She would improve her diet if she ate less fried food and snacked less.
sentences.cn: 如果她少吃油炸食品和零食的话，她的饮食结构就会有所改观。

sentences.en: The main dish is a fried steak.
The place stinks of fried onions.
sentences.cn: 这个地方有股煎洋葱的刺鼻气味。

sentences.en: The restaurant's specialities are fried clams.
sentences.cn: 这个餐厅的特色菜是炸蚌.

sentences.en: The smell of red pepper being fried irritates the nose.
The unusually hot sun has fried up the crops.
sentences.cn: 罕见的烈日烤坏了庄稼.

sentences.en: This stir - fried meat is very tender.
We do have a special on fried chicken today.
sentences.cn: 我们的炸鸡今天有特价.

sentences.en: Would you like some fried chicken?
sentences.cn: 你想要来一些油炸鸡吗？

words.tran_cn: 可供油炸的食品；油炸锅；做油煎食品的人
油炸的，油煎的；喝醉了的

phrases.tran_cn: 肯德基（来自美国的著名连锁快餐厅）

trans.tran_cn: 喝醉了的，油炸的，油煎的
trans.tran_en: having been cooked in hot oil

trans.tran_cn: 油炸，油煎（ fry的过去式和过去分词 ），皮肤晒黑
